Text: I thought it would be a few hours long, but it just is uncompressed video, about 6min for each video, but it is what it says

Much appreciated, I was looking for trooper gameplay footage for quite some time now. This is nice quality, I'd quess 720p. The video frame is a bit small, but if you know how to resize it in your player you can get a great picture. I am using Media Player Classic and all you have to do there is to select "Touch Window From Outside" in the video frame options.
